directions: In a large stock pot add water, potatoes, onion, celery and season with salt and pepper.  Bring to a boil, cover and simmer until potatoes and vegetables are tender.
Once tender, mash soup with a potato masher, and add butter and cream.
Gradually bring mixture to a simmer.  Add condensed cheese soup and blend.  Serve while hot.
ingredients: 6 large potatoes, peeled and sliced paper-thin
2 (11 ounce) cans condensed cream of Cheddar cheese soup
title: Easy Potato Cheese Soup
